entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Richmond Hill
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:35 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Thursday: Showers or drizzle. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating near noon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 08:20 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow near midnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 08:20 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 08:20 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
